data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: It is slightly cut off, you can compare it to when you expand on the image
data.short_description: Big enough images is slightly cut off on the right
data.steps_to_repro: - Send/Find an image, big enough to cover your screen from left to right - Look closely at the most right side of the picture
